name: Caster's Arena
description:
You are but a lone mage dying over and over in the arena! Your goal? To survive as long as you can, as waves of enemies come at you! Can you do it? Let us see!

I added a downloadable for anyone wants to download the game and keep track of their best scores! The web game is for anyone who doesn't want to download it or doesn't have a windows to play on!

The Music was gotten at "Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com"
